author: Sylvia Obell
title: People Are Desperately Waiting For Nicki Minaj To Respond To Remy Ma's Diss Track
text:
View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Andrew Toth / Getty Images ID: 10628302 Seven-minute ‚ÄúShether‚Äù is basically a Pulitzer-worthy investigation into every aspect of Minaj‚Äôs life: raps, money, sex life, body, family ‚Äì you name it, it was mentioned. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @RealRemyMa ID: 10628315 Ever since, the world has been waiting with bated breath for Minaj to respond with a follow-up diss track, as is custom in any respectable rap beef. But she‚Äôs just been posting lifestyle photos and tweeting stats, instead. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Instagram: @nickiminaj ID: 10628320 2. And well, fans are confused. @NICKIMINAJ You can post a bunch of pictures of yourself but you can't post up a diss track after getting dragged b‚Ä¶ https://t.co/dPRVZedhin
‚Äî GABBA DABBA DOO #BLM (@OG_gabby_D) ID: 10628203 3. Upset. @NICKIMINAJ @hm BARBZ ARE WAITING NICKI! RESPOND TO REMY MA! Don't throw rocks and hide your hands
‚Äî #IAm (@sipmylemonade) ID: 10628212 4. Fed up. @NICKIMINAJ we need that god damn diss track nicki what the hell are u up to
‚Äî job üåô (@aticacoustic) ID: 10628118 5. Disappointed. @NICKIMINAJ so no diss track eh?
‚Äî „Ö§ (@homeauxsexuaI) ID: 10628043 6. And unsure of how to go on. They playing the remi ma diss track on the radio. Nicki Minaj how are we gonna get out of this..
‚Äî JAY VERSACE (@tharealversace) ID: 10627697 7. But mostly, everyone‚Äôs just wondering what the hell is taking her so long to respond. Nicki Minaj still hasn't responded yet, has she? Wow, girl.
‚Äî Morgan Jerkins (@MorganJerkins) ID: 10627489 Day 2 and counting... @NICKIMINAJ
‚Äî Feminisce Mackie (@FeministaJones) ID: 10627542 @NICKIMINAJ GIRL DROP THAT SOUNDLOUD LINK OR LEAVE
‚Äî KATIE GOT MIMOSAZ ‚ú® (@KateMimosa) ID: 10628067 .@NICKIMINAJ don't tweet nothing else unless it's a link to your diss track
‚Äî brittany (@thirlagb) ID: 10627786 ok we getting impatient @NICKIMINAJ the studio is calling you
‚Äî Miami May 25-28 (@BlackDivaModels) ID: 10627518 If @NICKIMINAJ thinks a vid wit Future will make us forget she owe Remy bars or she took the biggest L EVER she more retarded than I thought
‚Äî Wild Wild Seth (@SpikeReeds) ID: 10627532 Don't let Bestsy DeVos' statement on HBCUs distract you from the fact that 48 hrs. later Nicki Minaj still hasn't responded #RemyMa #ShEther
‚Äî ShakariSBriggs (@ShakariSBriggs) ID: 10627537 When it's been 36+ hours and Nicki Minaj still hasn't responded to Remy Ma
‚Äî Kofi ü§ôüèø (@AfricanFlacko_) ID: 10627554 Dear Nicki Minaj: As of 8:00am today, the time for you to respond to Remy Ma's #shETHER has officially expired. Signed, Black America
‚Äî PrestonMitchum (@PrestonMitchum) ID: 10627562 .@NICKIMINAJ Sis, it's been 48 hours...
‚Äî Gabrielle‚ö°Ô∏èKathleen (@itsGabrielle_k) ID: 10627584 It's Monday February 27th, 2017 and Nicki Minaj has yet to respond to Remy Ma
‚Äî Gigi (@browngoddessxo) ID: 10627622 Don't let this Oscar Best Picture screwup distract you from the fact that Nicki Minaj still haven't responded to Remy Ma yet
‚Äî Deion of House Stark (@DeionGottaSTFU) ID: 10627687 19. Some still have confidence in Minaj. . @NICKIMINAJ will end @RealRemyMa anyday if she choses to respond. Are u lots forgetting that?! ü§î Nicki put out a song called 'SheOver' pls
‚Äî DJ HOLY (@MrHolyHQ) ID: 10627815 20. Others have decided to lend a helping hand. Here's ya diss @NICKIMINAJ for @RealRemyMa #barbzclapback #straightbars @NickiReigns @NickiMinajPromo
‚Äî Keljen (@BryanKeljen) ID: 10627766 21. And some feel like only God can fix this. A prayer for @NICKIMINAJ
‚Äî Kev√≠n (@KevOnStage) ID: 10627965 What do you think? Nicki Minaj needs to respond ASAP. It‚Äôs too late, her time is up. She doesn‚Äôt need to respond. I could care less either way.
